page.title: 20GOVERNMENT/PLANS-HEADCORN.
page.content: In 1984 the{Maidstone Borough Council published a "Consultation Draft" of a {Village Plan}for{Headcorn,}so that the residents could study and comment on the proposed improvements for the Village. Only the extreme{S-W.corner} of this block comes within the built- up boundary of this plan, but any alterations in the Village environment affects the whole Parish, so very keen interest was aroused. A revised Plan is to be issued in 1985,when the views of all concerned have been discussed. ------------------ These pages of text and accompanying slides of the area East of Headcorn Village,Kent have been contributed by members of Headcorn W.I. West-Kent. with grateful thanks to Headcorn Primary School for their help on the computer.
